SeasonalRouteNotes: The Anacortes-San Juan Islands route will operate its regular schedule on Thanksgiving and Christmas.

Alerts.AlertDescription: Regular schedule on Veterans Day, Tuesday, Nov. 11
Alerts.AlertFullTitle: Regular Schedule on Veterans Day, Tuesday, Nov 11
Alerts.AlertFullText: We are running a regular Tuesday schedule on Veterans Day, Tuesday, Nov. 11. Visit our schedules webpage to view your route schedule and learn more about our holiday schedules.
